lines.speaker: A
lines.zh: 哇，怎么寄来这么多东西！
lines.en: Wow, so many things in the parcel!

lines.speaker: A
lines.zh: 好多吃的啊，看来最近都不用去超市了！
lines.en: So much food! Looks like I won’t need to go to the supermarket for a while!

lines.speaker: A
lines.zh: 她怎么把七巧板寄过来了。。。在家里随便找个地方放就好了嘛！
lines.en: Why did she send me a tangram... She could have just left it anywhere at home!

lines.speaker: A
lines.zh: 不过，确实好久没见过它了。我记得小时候会拼好多图案呢！
lines.en: But indeed I haven’t seen a tangram in a while. I remember making so many patterns when I was a kid!

lines.speaker: A
lines.en: Maybe I should try making something with it?
